features: CLICK: "Visit the Jimmy Jems Store " link up top to visit our AMAZON STORE with over 500 Confetti Shapes, Colors & Mixes.
For Custom Confetti - Search Amazon Category HANDMADE; then " Jimmy Jems Confetti " - Add any Name, Shape, or Word to your event !
GREAT FOR: Birthdays, Parties, Pre-Teen Sleep Overs, and Special Kid Events
ENOUGH FOR: 1 to 2 Party Tables or 3 to 7 Invites.
SHAPE SIZE: 1 3/16" x 7/8" (30mm x 23mm), WEIGHT: .5 oz. (14 grams)
description: link near the Product Title at the top of the page, to Visit Our Amazon Store that lists over 500 Shapes and Colors of Confetti. .. The inventor of Metallic Confetti over 30 years ago in Los Angeles. All our Confetti is shipped to you FREE FREIGHT by USPS First Class or Priority Mail...
Alittle something about this Jimmy Jems Confetti Style.
Great fantasy shape for a Castle, Princess, Kids, Party or Event. Unicorns are well fed before they are shipped...
How many pieces of confetti per Half pound?

The great unknown. Each confetti style has it own unique shape and thus area and weight, thus do not count. For example a 1/4 Square would weigh more than a 1/4" Circle, and of course a 1/2" Star, would weigh more than both. Then we have mixed shape confetti that would never have the same exact proportion of shapes per each lb. Lastly, the weight of the material we use sometimes fluctuates. NIGHTMARE!!! So, we decided from the beginning to sell by weight and not by volume or piece. But, for an example, Jimmy instructed the crew in the back to come up with some numbers and here it goes. Remember - this is an estimate ONLY. In a half pound there are approximately 25,000 - 1/4" Circles, and 5,000 - 3/4" Stars
